snippet: Roy Hibbert had 24 points and 8 blocks, both season highs, leading the unbeaten Indiana Pacers past the visiting Milwaukee Bucks, 104-77, on Friday night.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers beat Milwaukee Bucks, 104-77; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Roy Hibbert had 24 points and 8 blocks, both season highs, leading the unbeaten Indiana Pacers past the visiting Milwaukee Bucks, 104-77, on Friday night.

headline.main: Pacers Rout the Bucks to Go to 9-0
